banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: How small business can benefit from "village banking"
videoData.socialTitle: How small business can benefit from "village banking"

nodes.whoTheyAre: Ruchi Shah is a lifelong student of business. She started her career in strategy consulting and investment banking. Having worked with billion-dollar businesses, she gained a back-to-basics perspective when she teamed up with FINCA International to invest in and meet micro-entrepreneurs in Guatemala and Ecuador. At UPS, she uses her entrepreneurial mindset to tap into new international growth opportunities and help small businesses expand into global markets.

videoData.description: Small businesses in the US are failing at an alarming rate. Nearly half close their doors by year 5, and 70% fail by year 10. The main reason? They run out of money. Compare that to small businesses in Ecuador and Guatemala that have a nearly 100% loan repayment rate with 85% of borrowers going on to expand their business. What's the secret to their success? Business strategist Ruchi Shah shares a community-based solution that every small business can learn from.
